job.title: Software Development Team for Marketing Platform Automation
job.description:
We are in search of an experienced and collaborative software development team to spearhead the creation of a cutting-edge marketing platform. The primary goal is to automate outreach processes on LinkedIn and email, redefining how businesses connect with their target audience.

Responsibilities:

Work closely with our product team to comprehend requirements and translate them into robust technical solutions.
Design, develop, test, and deploy scalable and efficient solutions for the marketing platform.
Create UI/UX mockups
Develop responsive and user-friendly front-end interfaces utilizing React.
Implement robust and scalable back-end services, demonstrating proficiency in either .NET or Node.js.
Integrate third-party APIs and services to enhance platform functionality.
Ensure seamless integration of front-end and back-end components through effective collaboration with cross-functional teams.
Proactively troubleshoot and resolve bugs and issues that arise during the development process.

Requirements:

Proven track record as a software development team with a strong emphasis on both front-end and back-end development.

UI/UX design expertise
Proficiency in React for front-end development.
Solid experience with either .NET or Node.js for back-end development.
Knowledge of relational databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB).
Familiarity with RESTful API design and integration.
Strong understanding of software architecture and design patterns.
Expertise in version control systems (e.g., Git).
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
Ability to work collaboratively in a dynamic team environment.

Please be prepared to provide a ballpark estimate of the time and budget for the project.

questions.question: Describe your recent experience with similar projects
Please list any certifications related to this project
What frameworks have you worked with?
Describe your approach to testing and improving QA
Include a link to your GitHub profile and/or website

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking to hire a software development team for a marketing platform automation project. This is a long-term project, lasting more than 6 months. 

The ideal candidate should have expertise in web development, HTML, API integration, HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript. 

The main objective of this project is to automate various marketing tasks and processes within our platform. The team will be responsible for developing and implementing new features, as well as maintaining and improving existing functionality. 

To apply for this job, please submit a proposal detailing how you can contribute to the project. Specifically, explain your experience in marketing automation and highlight any relevant past projects. We would also appreciate it if you could include links to these projects for us to review. 

We look forward to hearing from you and finding the right team to help us achieve our marketing automation goals.
